mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erd_table_tbl (erdNo, userNo, tableName, xaxis, yaxis, id) VALUES (#{erdNo}, #{userNo}, #{tableName}, #{xaxis}, #{yaxis}, #{id})
mapper.delete: delete from erd_table_tbl where erdNo = #{erdNo} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into erd_memo_tbl (erdNo, content, xaxis, yaxis, id) values (#{erdNo}, #{content}, #{xaxis}, #{yaxis}, #{id})
mapper.delete: delete from erd_memo_tbl where erdNo = #{erdNo} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into erd_arrow_tbl (erdNo, startXaxis, startYaxis, endXaxis, endYaxis, startId, endId, relativeStartX, relativeStartY, relativeEndX, relativeEndY) values (#{erdNo}, #{startXaxis}, #{startYaxis}, #{endXaxis}, #{endYaxis}, #{startId}, #{endId}, #{relativeStartX}, #{relativeStartY}, #{relativeEndX}, #{relativeEndY})
mapper.delete: delete from erd_arrow_tbl where erdNo = #{erdNo} and startId = #{startId} and endId = #{endId}
mapper.insert: insert into erd_table_column_tbl (isPrimary, field, domain, type, userNo, id, fieldId) values (#{isPrimary}, #{field}, #{domain}, #{type}, #{userNo}, #{id}, #{fieldId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM erd_table_column_tbl WHERE fieldId = #{fieldId} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE erd_arrow_tbl SET startXaxis = #{startXaxis}, startYaxis = #{startYaxis}, relativeStartX = #{relativeStartX}, relativeStartY = #{relativeStartY}, endXaxis = #{endXaxis}, endYaxis = #{endYaxis}, relativeEndX = #{relativeEndX}, relativeEndY = #{relativeEndY} WHERE startId = #{startId} AND endId = #{endId};
mapper.insert: insert into erd_history_tbl (action, erdUpdateDate, erdNo, userId) values (#{action}, #{erdUpdateDate}, #{erdNo}, #{userId})
